name: Go Milk Yourself
description:
This is the first project Moobware has made where most of the development was done over a live stream on twitch.  It started as a hackathon project and seemed like it would lend itself well to a beginner game dev learning Unity.  It's got a breadth of basic concepts within it like 3D modeling, UI, animation, gamepad input, scripting, audio, etc.

We're planning on incorporating Go Milk Yourself as a mini-game/loading screen into a larger game we're making, so feedback is appreciated!

You can get the code on Github,  watch previous development on Youtube, watch new development live on Twitch, and can give us grief on Twitter!  The links to all of those things are on this page, have at it!
